//kol15c
//new concept

#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
#define inf 1000000000
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long
#define in(x) scanf("%d",&x);
#define rep(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define rrep(i,n) for(i=n-1;i>=0;i--)

struct yo
{
    int first;
    int second;
};
yo v[200100];

bool comp(yo abc, yo def)
{
    if(abc.first==def.first)
        return abc.second<def.second;
    else
        return abc.first<def.first;
}

int a1[100010],c[100010];
int main()
{
    int n,s,j,u,a,b,i,ans;
    in(n)
    in(u)
    s=floor(sqrt(u));
    rep(i,u)
        scanf("%d%d",&v[i].first,&v[i].second);
    sort(v,v+u,comp);
    i=0;
    a=v[i].first;
    c[v[i].second]++;
    for(j=a+1;j<=n;j++)
        if(j-a>=1)
            c[j]=c[j]+c[j-a];
    for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
        a1[j]+=c[j];
    i=1;
    while(v[i].first<=s&&i<u)
    {
        a=v[i].first;
        memset(c,0,sizeof(c));
        while(v[i].first==a&&i<u)
        {
            c[v[i].second]++;
            i++;
        }
        for(j=a+1;j<=n;j++)
            if(j-a>=1)
                c[j]=c[j]+c[j-a];
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
            a1[j]+=c[j];
    }
    while(i<u)
    {
        a=v[i].first;
        for(j=v[i].second;j<=n;j+=a)
            a1[j]++;
        i++;
    }
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        printf("%d ",a1[i]);
    cout<<endl;
    return 0;
}
